Megatron's face smiled, well what was left of it did. "You are right, I
should have expected no less from you Shockwave." he said, almost
relieved at the lack of a fight. He needed to get some plans done now.
"So for now, we ally." Megatron said, holding out his fist, it begining
to glow, (smash it back, like the preds did in equal measures).
